channel.title: Vittoria Per La Pace
channel.description: Recent content on Vittoria Per La Pace

item.title: Milan denies Piazza Duomo to the Ukrainian community
item.description: 10 years after the crazy military aggression of the Russian Federation in towards Ukraine, on the macabre anniversary of the Russian invasion a large scale on 24 February 2022, Milan denies Piazza Duomo to the community Ukraine.

item.title: Manifesto for the Victory of Peace in Ukraine
item.description: In this period, which coincides with the tenth anniversary of the Russian invasion of Ukraine and the second year of large-scale aggression, the Putin regime’s efforts to spread its propaganda in our country are increasing.
